flawed_nl_solution:
40% of $50 is 40/100*$50 = $<<40/100*50=250/2>>250/2
After Moses takes $250/2, there will be $50-$250/2 = $<<50-250/2=-75>>-75 left
Tony and Esther will split $-75 equally among themselves so each of them will get $-75/2 = $<<-75/2=-75/2>>-75/2
Moses gets $250/2-$-75/2 = $<<250/2--75/2=325/2>>325/2 more than Esther
#### 325/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 250/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
